name: Vegan Banana Bread
author: JW
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups white whole wheat flour
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line two 9x5-inch loaf pans with parchment paper
Process pecan halves in a food processor until a flour forms; transfer to a bowl
Process oats in the food processor until a flour forms; add to pecan flour
Mix bananas and sugar together in a bowl; add to pecan flour mixture
Stir white whole wheat flour, baking powder, coconut oil, and salt into pecan flour mixture until batter is thick and well mixed
Spoon batter into prepared loaf pans
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center of a loaf comes out clean, about 45 minutes
